input.description: The name of the adapter to use to handle the request. Default adapter name: MSSCCMActor.

Sample items Xml:
<items> <item> <target>config2</target> <advertisement-id>45620016</advertisement-id> <advertisement-name>Test Advertisement</advertisement-name> </item> </items>
Elements' Description:
item [Required] This is a child tag of <items> tag. The <item> tag can be specified multiple times to support "multiple items support".
target [Optional]: This element to specify the connection information for the Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager application.
Valid values: The value specified for <target> XML element must be same as the value that has been specified for the name attribute of <config> element in Grid Manager adapter configuration.
Default value: If this element is not provided or left empty, the request will be executed on the first defined Grid Manager adapter configuration.
Note: The value of this tag is case sensitive.
advertisement-id[Conditional] Id of the advertisement to be deleted. This parameter is required if "advertisement-name" is not provided.
Note: If both "advertisement-id" and "advertisement-name" are provided then "advertisement-id" will take precedence for deletion.
advertisement-name[Conditional] Name of the advertisement(s) to be deleted. This parameter is required if "advertisement-id" is not provided.
Note: If both "advertisement-id" and "advertisement-name" are provided then "advertisement-id" will take precedence for deletion. Note: If only "advertisement-name" is provided and there are multiple advertisements with the same name, all of them will be deleted.

output.description: Returned adapter response is captured in this context parameter.

documentation.description:
Delete Advertisement
This process deletes one or more advertisement(s).
